Workspace.label: Workspace
Workspace.show-interpolated-tips: Show hidden interpolated objects in the side panel
Workspace.show-text-always-tips: Show text for an object on the canvas not only when the object is activated
Workspace.auto-borders-tips: Enable automatic bordering for polygons and polylines during drawing/editing
Workspace.intelligent-polygon-cropping-tips: Try to crop polygons automatically when editing
Workspace.Show frame tags in the corner of the wor: Show frame tags in the corner of the workspace
Workspace.approx-poly-threshold: Default number of points in polygon approximation
Workspace.approx-poly-threshold-tips: Works for serverless interactors and OpenCV scissors

Shortcuts.label: Shortcuts
Shortcuts.restore-modal-title: Are you sure you want to restore defaults?
Shortcuts.warning: Shortcut may consist of any combination of modifiers (alt, ctrl, or shift) and one non-modifier at the end. Some key combinations may be reserved by the browser and cannot be overridden in CVAT.
